data.text: @TusharA07839659 Hi Tushar, please note, for voluntary cancellation/changes, charges are applicable as per our terms of carriage. You may refer to our website https://t.co/PiY4D4HDDy point 8 for information on the charges. You may modify your booking via https://t.co/XrLjAWyjoT.
